release.action: PK-26037: Endring på loggnivå for forskjellige hendelser i forbindelse med System Throttling Interceptor
PK-18038: La til JNDI lookup, fjernet systemName.xml property verdi innlesing
PKIGUAN-353: Removed use of deprecated API when generating StelvioContext.correlationId
IRPORT-1457: save stubbing data with unique filenames, not based on timestamp
IRPORT-1099: Always create work area for context propagation (provided an SOAPHeader). Added logic name to the work area
IRPORT-1086: Endre feilhåndtering i StelvioContextHandler for å kaste NotOriginator-feil
Improved error message when an error occured reading XML (stubbing)
NAV00243862: Static initialization of JAXBContext for StelvioPropagationContext (performance)
Add check for null in isOneWayOperation
Fix stubbing framework when using primitive types
Fix listInstalledNAVModules in stubbing framework
Add methods for reading SystemNames and more from from stubbing framework. To be used in automated testing.
Fix SIR 182044: Incorrect validation in validateSupported.

Incident 183726: Implemented new utility method to "visit" all simple properties in a data object structure. Added two new methods using this new utility. One for trimming string properties (as requested by incident), and one to nullify blank strings. The latter functionality is currently duplicated in several modules.
Added support for one-way operations
Fix recording for WPS 7.0
Remove requestContextDto from input to avoid every message being unique
New interceptor component implementation (SetRequestContextComponent) that can be used to extract information from the Stelvio Context to Request Context.
New interceptor component implementation (EmptyInterceptorService) that can be used when you need a dummy component to set some configuration.
Re-implementation of stubbing framework. Improved code structure and error handling.
New JAX-WS handler to interpret Stelvio Context when using JAX-WS exports (instead of JAX-RPC)
Migrated to WPS 7
SIR 175088: NPE in SystemStubbingInterceptor when recording void-methods (or one-way oeprations)
Deleted obsolete xsd-includes files from WID 6.0
Fixed SIR 158228, Impl 159949: Fixed bug i code that calculates age based on FNR and date.
Fixed bug related to SIR 125127, Impl 142320: MaxSimultaneousInvocations was set to 0 if not set explicitly.
Various (backwards-compatible) changes preparing for migration to WPS 7.
CR 97658, Impl 127795: Made PID validation methods in FnrUtil delegate to Pid class copied (and slightly modified to support H-numbers) from Stelvio App - that includes the fix for the CR.
Fixed problem when the systemavailability was used to stub interfaces that were directly imported as wsdl's from the provider system.
Fixed bug in CatchServiceRuntimeExceptionInterceptor resulting in 'cause already initialized' errors.
Fixed issues in StelvioCommonContextHandler with creation/deletion of UserWorkArea.
Incident 143881: Implemented functionality for creating/updating StelvioContext.

SIR 125127: SystemAvailability has been extended with functionality to limit the number of concurrent calls to a specific module. The default value is 25, but this is configurable using the regular SystemAvailabilityWeb application (which modifies an .xml file-structure in the SystemAvailabilityFramework-directory). Also, caching of the systemavailability property file was introduced.
Fixed error resulting in IllegalStateException in CatchServiceRuntimeExceptionInterceptor
Class ErrorHelperUtil 3 new methods for determining root cause of error Incident 102422
Clean up warnings from SystemStubbingInterceptor and JMSListenerMDB
Removed FGSAK credential feature Incident 102084
Stubbing framework that was introduced with introduction of interceptors. The former version produced an empty response stub file.
Fixed incorrect usage of variables at FnrUtil - SIR 102421
Parent POM versionupdate. Nothing else.
Incident 80765: Info from SBEs wrapped in SREs is now propagated. Contains information about root cause.
SIR89515, Impl 99113: FnrUtil fnr validation updated.
POM: Changed parent POM. Added name and description.
First release with maven release plugin.
Added method ErrorHelperUtil.getFaultName to get name of SBE
